jangle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if metal objects jangle, or if you jangle them, they make a sound when they hit each other
jangle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her bracelets jangled on her wrist.
jangle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if your nerves jangle, or if something jangles your nerves, you feel nervous or upset
jangle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The harsh sound jangled his nerves.
